text: Which of the following statement is/are true? (@) If graph G doesn’t contain any clique of size 3 then its chromatic number cannot be 4. (b) If the chromatic number of the graph G is 2 then it doesn’t contain any cycle of length more than 2. (0) If the chromatic number of the graph G is less than 5 then G is planar. (d) If G is planar graph then the chromatic number of G is less than 5.
